wblut.hemesh.modifiers
Class HEM_Slice

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Modifier
      wblut.hemesh.modifiers.HEM_Slice
All Implemented Interfaces:
HE_Manipulator
public class HEM_Slice
extends HEM_Modifier

Planar cut of a mesh. Faces on positive side of cut plane are removed.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
